objects.name: Analytic 1636
objects.description: Detects exploitation of IaaS cloud security boundaries to evade defense controls. Defender perspective includes anomalous API calls that bypass audit logging, disable monitoring, or manipulate guardrails (e.g., CloudTrail tampering). Correlation highlights when exploitation attempts precede sudden absence of expected telemetry.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: AWS:CloudTrail
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: StopLogging, DeleteTrail, UpdateTrail: API calls that disable or modify logging services

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: List of sensitive cloud API operations that should be rare and tightly monitored.
Duration for correlation of API exploitation with sudden logging gaps.
